post.author: 박경종
post.content:
Nassau(Bahamas)에서 일하고 계시는 정대원씨가 보내주신 Job Opening입니다.


Working opportunities in Bahamas (APT 제공)

CIS is looking for 2 programmer/analyst in Toronto or Nassau
Contract for 1 - 3 years

Experienced with
VB 6.0, SQL Server, SQL(Stored Procedure), Crystal Report, Custom OCX:DLL, VSS

Nice to have DB2/AS400

Send your resume to cis@batelnet.bs

정대원씨 E-mail은 djeong@rogers.com입니다.
post.title: Working opportunities in Bahamas
